item.title: KRYPTON USERS---- If you are getting a Migrating Addons Splash every start-up please update to fix
The first time you use an item after updating MK-IV will take a little longer, this is normal as it is cacheing files and generating thumbnails. Please be patient.
Visit www.mkiv.ca to find out which addons are streaming tonights fight, big game, or event.
If you are having issues with the content lock staying unlocked, clear your cache and it will force it to re-activate. You can also change the password in the Turks add-on settings.
Thanks for all the support!!! If you have any questions or comments feel free to contact me on the Ares forum - https://ares-project.uk/ - @CamC
When watching YouTube based sections like DOGTV or J.P.T. - Press the "C" key or long press the selection button and select "Play from here" to auto play the next item.
Click on MK-IV for Christmas movies and fireplaces.
